title: 怎么搞能放在青金石上的末地烛？
author: SilentSkyShine
txt_content: 怎么搞能放在青金石上的玻璃？，

replies.author: 下路ADC
replies.txt_content:
玻璃：
/give @p minecraft:glass 1 0 {CanPlaceOn:["minecraft:lapis_block"]}复制代码
minecraft:glass是玻璃，lapis_block是青金石块
末地烛同理：
/give @p minecraft:end_rod 1 0 {CanPlaceOn:["minecraft:lapis_block"]}复制代码
--------------------------------------------------------------
如果是可以放在多个方块上面：
/give @p minecraft:end_rod 1 0 {CanPlaceOn:["minecraft:stone","minecraft:ice"]}复制代码
这个NBT指可以放在石头或冰块上的末地烛

replies.author: 下路ADC
replies.txt_content: 只能放在青金石块上吗？冒险模式才能用，要加nbt

replies.author: SilentSkyShine
replies.txt_content:
下路ADC 发表于 2018-2-7 10:00
只能放在青金石块上吗？冒险模式才能用，要加nbt
废话。这我知道

replies.author: Enron233
replies.txt_content: 使用创世神 强制在青金石上放置末地烛

replies.author: free8605
replies.txt_content:
/give @p minecraft:end_rod 1 0 {CanPlaceOn:["minecraft:lapis_block"]}复制代码

玻璃glass 染色的就stained_glass
